statements: SELECT * FROM FanPreferences;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, favorite_genre FROM FanPreferences;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, favorite_genre, behavior_score FROM FanPreferences WHERE behavior_score > 0.5;
SELECT fan_name, preferred_content FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Action';
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, preferred_content FROM FanPreferences ORDER BY fan_id DESC;
SELECT fan_name, favorite_genre FROM FanPreferences WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Action' AND behavior_score < 50;
SELECT fan_name, preferred_content FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY fan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FanPreferences WHERE behavior_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY behavior_score DESC, fan_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_fans, AVG(behavior_score) AS avg_behavior_score FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_genre IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fans;
SELECT fan_name, email FROM fans WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences WHERE fan_id = 3;
SELECT experience_name, experience_details FROM ar_experiences WHERE fan_id = 2;
SELECT fan_name, preferences FROM fans WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT fan_name, email FROM fans WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_name, preferences FROM fans WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT fan_name, experience_name FROM fans JOIN ar_experiences ON fans.fan_id = ar_experiences.fan_id;
SELECT fan_name, preferences FROM fans WHERE tracking_behavior IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fan_name DESC;
SELECT fan_name, experience_name FROM fans JOIN ar_experiences ON fans.fan_id = ar_experiences.fan_id WHERE fans.preferences LIKE 'Sci-Fi%' ORDER BY fan_name, experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_type, timestamp FROM behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, experience_name FROM ar_experiences WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, preferences FROM users LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, behavior.behavior_type, behavior.timestamp FROM users JOIN behavior ON users.user_id = behavior.user_id;
SELECT user_id, preferences->>'theme' AS theme FROM users WHERE preferences->>'notifications' = 'on';
SELECT user_id, experience_name FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY experience_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fans WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM fans WHERE fan_location = 'New York';
SELECT fan_id, fan_location, fan_age FROM fans ORDER BY fan_age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT fan_location FROM fans;
SELECT fan_name, fan_age, fan_location FROM fans WHERE fan_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM fans WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM fans WHERE fan_location = 'New York';
SELECT fan_name, fan_age, fan_location FROM fans ORDER BY fan_age DESC;
SELECT SUM(experience_rating) AS total_rating FROM ar_experiences WHERE fan_id = 2;
SELECT fan_name, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM fans JOIN preferences ON fans.fan_id = preferences.fan_id GROUP BY fan_name ORDER BY preference_count DESC;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_email FROM Fans;
SELECT fan_id, fan_phone, fan_birthdate FROM Fans;
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_email, fan_birthdate FROM Fans WHERE fan_id = 2;
SELECT fan_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM Behaviors ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_phone FROM Fans;
SELECT fan_id, fan_birthdate FROM Fans ORDER BY fan_birthdate DESC;
SELECT fan_name, preference_name, preference_category FROM Fans JOIN Preferences ON Fans.fan_id = Preferences.fan_id;
SELECT fan_name, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM Fans JOIN Behaviors ON Fans.fan_id = Behaviors.fan_id WHERE behavior_type = 'interaction';

SELECT fan_name, experience_name, experience_description FROM Fans JOIN FanARPreferences ON Fans.fan_id = FanARPreferences.fan_id JOIN ARExperiences ON FanARPreferences.experience_id = ARExperiences.experience_id;
